title: Prepare for a Listing Presentation
description: An agent has an appointment with a potential seller and needs to prepare a compelling presentation to win the listing.

tasks.description: Prepare a detailed Comparative Market Analysis (CMA) for the property.
Create a customized marketing plan for the property, detailing how it will be advertised.
tasks.expected_outcome: A specific marketing strategy is outlined.

tasks.description: Assemble a listing presentation package, including the CMA, marketing plan, your professional resume, and client testimonials.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete and persuasive presentation package is ready for the meeting.
